channel.itunes:author: Marissa Newman
channel.itunes:subtitle: Worldwide Pagan Poetry Talkcast
channel.itunes:summary: Poems and Stories that have been written by Pagans of different paths. Artwork by Pagan and Proud Of It paganart.dreamdivining.com This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com

item.title: EPISODE 24 - Silverlyn: Night Wisdom
item.author: Sales@be-jeweled.net
item.description: Biography: Silverlyn started writing poetry at the young age of 12 while walking outside each night. The sights and sounds of the Night fascinated her into writing about it's transforming beauty. Along this time, she also began studying philosophy and religion and was drawn to the the Earth-based paths. Taking beliefs from Druidry, Paganism and Wicca, they have given her personal joy and power from then on; their themes reflected in many of her writings. Silverlyn is now 40, still loves to write, is happily married and has two grown children and one new grandson. She lives in Wichita, KS with her two cats and two dogs.
item.itunes:author: Marissa Newman

item.title: EPISODE 23 - Witch Linkk: I am a Witch
item.author: Sales@be-jeweled.net
item.description: 8 Poems by Witch Linkk. Witch Linkk Biography: Linkk has been a witch for over 35 years. He has mixed beliefs but he originally was drawn to Wicca through Gardeners belief.

item.title: EPISODE 13 - Lord Raven: The Burning Witch
item.author: Sales@be-jeweled.net
item.description:
A short story by Christopher A. Goben aka Lord Raven. Biography: My name is Christopher A. Goben. I am a solitary witch who lives by the old ways for the love of the Lord and Lady and the earth who is our mother.
I am a freelance writer of Pagan and Native American Lore. I have written short stories such as "The Birth of Two Gods" and the "Wedge Between Man and Fairies". I also write Pagan and Vampire poems as well. I hope you enjoy my writings as they come to me from the Blessing of the "Old Ones".
Blessed Be Unto You, Christopher A. Goben aka Lord Raven.

item.title: EPISODE 9 - Poems by Sonofae
item.author: Sales@be-jeweled.net
item.description: A collection of Poems by Jamie Volner aka Sonofae. Biography: I started my Pagan Path at the age of 19. I am now 41 years of age. After many years of questioning the Catholic faith as a child I came upon and met a young man named Matt who happend to follow a Druidic Path and became my best friend. His father also was Druid which is how I got my start within the realm of the Old Religion's. I later evolved into Wicca. I hope you enjoy my writings. Peace, Love & Light Jamie Volner
item.itunes:author: Marissa Newman
